entity.name: Passengers on cruise ship disembark in Cambodia after multiple countries deny entry over coronavirus fears
entity.description: Cambodia’s health ministry said no one on board tested positive for the virus. The Westerdam, operated by Holland America Line, was left stranded after multiple countries turned the luxury liner away from its ports. The ship, which has 2,257 people on board, was rejected by Thailand, Taiwan, Japan, the Philippines and Guam.
